adjective.description: Without boundaries between countries, administrative divisions, or other areas.
examples: we want to share our space and live in a borderless region
naval forces will continue operating from an essentially borderless domain
the uniform spread of blue light creates a borderless space

adjective.description: Lacking the plain or decorated strip typically included around the edge.
examples: the printer can produce a 4x6 inch borderless photo in 36 seconds
